reference.shortdesc: The chapter element references a topic or map as a chapter within a book.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The chapter element is specialized from topicref. It is defined in the bookmap module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how the chapter element is used to create two chapters within a publication:<bookmap> <booktitle> <mainbooktitle>A book about one thing</mainbooktitle> </booktitle> <!-- ... metadata and front matter ... --> <chapter href="intro.dita"> <topicref href="caring.dita"/> <topicref href="feeding.dita"/> </chapter> <chapter href="setup.dita"> <topicref href="prereq.dita"/> <topicref href="download.dita"/> </chapter> <!-- ... more chapters and back matter ... --> </bookmap>
